Package com.continuuity.loom.runtime

Classes that can be run with main functions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DaemonMain A abstract base class for bridging standard main method to method invoked through apache commons-daemon jsvc.
DummyProvisioner Loom Provisioner that takes and finishes tasks without actually doing any work for testing purposes.
DummyProvisioner.Provisioner Runnable that takes tasks from the server and posts back success or failure.
LoomServerMain Loom server.
 

Package com.continuuity.loom.runtime Description

Classes that can be run with main functions.
